data.title: St. Catharines
data.text:
At KPMG in Canada, we work to provide you with the one-on-one personalized service you desire. We strive for the highest professional standards and are committed to producing leading results for you.

KPMG has the resources required to provide a full range of services to clients situated in the Niagara region, while offering the strength of our national and international member firms. We recognize that for our clients, personalized service at the local level is essential. We know that earning your business and your trust comes down to superior service and delivering value. We are dedicated to serving you for years to come because we want to grow with you and see your organization succeed year after year.

KPMG provides Audit, Tax, and Advisory services to a number of leading private businesses, not-for-profit, and public-sector organizations.

We work closely with our clients, helping them to mitigate risks and grasp opportunities.

Our KPMG Private Enterprise team is dedicated to working with private businesses ranging from entrepreneurs and family businesses to fast-growing companies. Our advisors understand what it takes for you to be successful at each stage of your business, whether you are looking to grow, or expand internationally, strengthen, or to exit your business.

As one of the leading professional services firms in Canada, KPMG believes in the power of business and our people to drive social change. KPMG helps address the most pressing needs in our local communities by collaborating with leading not-for-profits and supporting our people's active participation in giving back.

Some local organizations that we support are:

Niagara Children's Centre

YMCA St. Catharines

Community Cares

United Way

Coldest Night of the Year
